Throughout this blogdown site you will see emoji's used. To do this simply add the line **enableEmoji : true** to the top of your document and in the config.yaml. 

Note that all emoji's use colons on either side of the word. 

smile $\rightarrow$ :smile: , heart $\rightarrow$ :heart: , thumbsup $\rightarrow$ :thumbsup:
